CustomField.formula:
CASE(StageName, "Pipeline", 0, "In discussion", 1, "Negotiations", 2, "Advanced Negotiation", 3, "Agreed in Principle", 4, "Out for Signature", 5, "Heads of Terms Signed", 6, "Lease Signed Awaiting Unit", 7, "Shopfitting", 8, "Stuck", 0, "On hold", 0, "Completed - New Brand opened in Village", 100, "Finished - Deal Failed", 0, "Completed - Brand Exited", 100, "Completed - Brand Relocated", 100, "Completed - Brand Refitted", 100, "Completed - Contract Updated", 100,
0)
CustomField.label: Stage_Value
